headline: /businessindustryandtrade/tourismindustry/timeseries/gmat
lede: The Tourism Industry include all those establishments whose main activity concerns producing products or services for visitors. Tourism is defined by the activities of persons identified as visitors. A visitor is someone who is making a visit to a main destination outside his/her usual environment for less than a year for any main purpose [including] holidays, leisure and recreation, business, health, education or other purposes.
name: Tourism Industry
